message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on designing a cooperative medium access control (MAC) layer protocol for wireless networks, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper utilizes distributed space-time coding (DSTC) and randomized distributed space-time coding (R-DSTC) schemes, which are related to information theory. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the coordination and control of multiple relays in a distributed environment, which falls under the scope of systems and control. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper evaluates the network capacity and delay performance, which are important metrics for multimedia applications. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes a novel DSTC scheme called R-DSTC, which involves designing algorithms for efficient transmission.
